rule: The output must include explanations, surrounding text, or context apart from the expected response, exceeding one word and deviating from the required format (from the list or one of the alternatives "Unknown" or "CantAnswer").
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single tag, "PP". This tag is not present in the list of allowed part-of-speech tags defined in the description. Therefore, the output does not comply with the given rules.
ERR
